text:
[Verse]
Sunrise light just broke the dawn
Birds are singing everyone
Day is bright the sky is clear
Feel the magic in the air

[Verse 2]
Coffee brews the morning starts
Traffic hums and engines spark
Step outside to join the day
Life is moving come and play

[Chorus]
Fleeting moments let them shine
Hold them close they're yours and mine
Dance in rhythm with the beat
Find your joy on every street

[Verse 3]
Afternoon the sun is high
Shadows short and breezes sigh
Friends together memories grow
In the warmth our spirits glow

[Bridge]
Night will come the stars will call
Moonlight shadows on the wall
Hold my hand and don’t let go
Fleeting moments let them flow

[Chorus]
Fleeting moments let them shine
Hold them close they're yours and mine
Dance in rhythm with the beat
Find your joy on every street
title: Fleeting Moments
